Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory116.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Done. All weapon systems of the space station have been disabled.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Broadcast', 3: 'A friendly reminder from Korolev: Dear children, please treat public facilities with love and careâ€”'}
{2: 'Broadcast', 3: 'Serious offenders will be separated from their parents for one week in correctional facilities.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Will this thing ever shut up...', 4: '1'}
{2: "It's starting to get on my nerves.", 3: '10', 4: "I think it's quite cute.", 5: '10'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory111.png'}
{3: 'In space.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "Watanabe, it's so crowded in here.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "It's not meant for two.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Have you brought mint leaves?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'How do you know...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "I've been following the news.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: "To be more specific, I've been keeping up with the news on Gray Raven, and that includes everything and everyone in their proximity.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Why Gray Raven... Whatever, none of my business.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: "Oh, there's nothing I can't tell. It's really just their commandant I'm interested in. By the way...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Even if you are wearing such an outfit... You must have some spare ones left, right? Can I have one as a souvenir?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Watanabe continues to fly the aircraft with ease while they talk.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'After another enemy explodes into cosmic dust, Watanabe takes out a mint leaf from the cockpit and passes it to Ayla.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ayla', 3: 'I shall give you something in return.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Ayla takes out her pen and signs on the cover of Watanabe's cockpit.", 5: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "Is this what Babylonia's new generation is like... Whatever.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "All done. I'll leave the rest to you.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forsaken Pilot', 3: 'Roger.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Sit tight.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Watanabe and his Forsaken air force have already eliminated most Corrupted drones with superb efficiency.'}
{3: "He and a few other aircraft suddenly accelerate, entering the range of the space station's defense weapon system."}
{2: 'System', 3: 'Lock-on warning. Incoming attacks. Amount: 16...'}
{3: 'Watanabe pulls up his aircraft, barely missing the incoming shots.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "You've got good space compatibility and g-force endurance.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Watanabe turns his aircraft around and is about to attack the defense system when...'}
{2: 'System', 3: 'Enemy fire control system offline...'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Hmph, it must be Gray Raven.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Oh? How do you know?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I've met many Babylonian squads, but only they can do that.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'So Gray Raven is also special to you, huh?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "...Enough talking. We've arrived at your landing point. I'll drop you off nearby.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ayla', 3: 'Oh, alright then. Thanks for the ride, Watanabe. See you next time.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "I don't think there will be a next time.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ayla waves goodbye to Watanabe. He immediately takes off again and starts searching.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'I remember it should be somewhere around here... Found it.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'It is an aircraft with no signs to indicate its faction. It lands on the surface of the space station, creating a huge opening.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Looks like we have some uninvited guests...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'The deal with Babylonia is supposed to end here...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'Gray Raven...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Watanabe pilots his aircraft toward the main entrance of the space station.'}
